channel.title: Emote help for you

item.title: Emote help for you
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

That Plays a GFX.
To make it play an emote would be

[code]if (command.startsWith("######")){
pEmote(Emote ####,absY,absX);

		}
		[/code]

item.title: Emote help for you
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

hi here is a way to find out how to get emote ids my way
past this were your commands go

[code]if (command.startsWith(“emotehelp”)){
animation(Emote Here,absY,absX);

		}
		[/code]

or

[code]if (command.startsWith(“emotehelp”)){
animation(Emote Here);

		}
		[/code]

Now Were i have Emote Here Put Eny Random Number Ide Say Between 1-200 and then save an go on your server an type ::emotehelp

hope this helps im not 100% sure this works tho lol please post if it dose not
